<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: You can use the following code to convert the object values to a TreeSet object:
```scss
TreeSet<Integer> treeSet = new TreeSet<>();
treeSet.addAll(Arrays.asList(obj.split(",")));
```
This will convert the string representation of the TreeSet to a TreeSet object that you can iterate over.

<<<explanation>>>: The `Arrays.asList()` method is used to convert the string representation of the TreeSet to a list of integers, which is then added to the TreeSet object using the `addAll()` method. The `split(",")` method is used to split the string representation of the TreeSet into a list of integers, which are then added to the TreeSet object.
